title: New Client Bugsplats
body:
The new league client (although stylish and a change of flavor) has caused me to have my client crash so many times these past few days. Seconds ago, I was in a ranked game for my promos. I was about to lock in my champion when the game crashes and the bugsplat error comes up and I am forced to dodge. This has happened about 4 times ever since the new client was released.




Can anyone help ? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Your update may not have installed properly and resulted in some corrupt game data.  It really sucks that happened during a ranked game, and I'd like to help so it doesn't happen again.  To start off, I suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix it up.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with any automatic processes.  Test it out on a custom game to be sure everything is okay.  I hope that helps!
